translation.en: Fuck.
-Hi. -[Ruth] Liv, where are you?
translation.ja: どうも リヴ どこにいるの？

translation.en: -I just got your email. -[Liv] I'm fine.
translation.ja: リヴ どこにいるの？

translation.en: I just have to go out of town for a couple of days.
translation.ja: 数日 街を離れるわ

translation.en: [Ruth] Out of town? Is everything--
Everything's in the email I sent. I know it's a lot.
translation.ja: 詳細は全部メールで送ったわ

translation.en: I just don't want any surprises. I'll try to check in when I can.
translation.ja: 詳細は全部メールで送ったわ 電波が入れば また連絡する

translation.en: I just don't know what service is gonna be like.
translation.ja: 電波が入れば また連絡する

translation.en: [Ruth] Sure. Should I loop Danny in?
This is Danny.
He just came over with the merger.
translation.ja: 異動してきたばかりよ

translation.en: Hi.
Um… nice to meet you.
Yeah. Why… why wouldn't you?
[Ruth] He's just asking if you still want him on this.
translation.ja: あなたは彼を必要としてる？

translation.en: He's a great lawyer, of course, I do.
Anyway, it's not my call.
translation.ja: 私が決めることじゃない

translation.en: -[Ruth] Liv, are you sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
Let's circle back on prep strategy once I'm back in the office.
translation.ja: 戻ったら話し合いましょう

translation.en: I've just never known you to take time off--
Ruth, I'm fine. I really have to go. Um,
translation.ja: もう行くね ルス何かあればメールして

translation.en: -text me if you need anything, okay? Bye. -[Ruth] Liv…
translation.ja: もう行くね ルス何かあればメールして リヴ…

translation.en: -[staff] Olivia Rivera? -[Liv] Yeah. [staff] You're the 1:10 trip to Inuvik, right?
translation.ja: オリヴィア･リベラ様ですね

translation.en: Yes. My plane was supposed to leave like an hour ago?
Yeah, sorry about that. It looks like wind's pretty bad up in Outer Rapids today.
translation.ja: 申し訳ありませんが本日 強風のため

translation.en: Your plane's stuck there, so, you're kind of SOL, unfortunately.
translation.ja: 搭乗予定の便が到着していません

translation.en: We can try to get you on something tomorrow maybe?
What? No! No, no, no. I-- I took two flights to get here from New York.
translation.ja: ウソでしょＮＹから はるばる来たのに

translation.en: I have to get to Inuvik today.
I'm… I'm trying to meet someone before they leave again.
translation.ja: 人と会おうと思ってる

translation.en: -Maybe you can call them? -[Liv] No, I…
She… she doesn't know I'm coming.
translation.ja: 相手は私が行くと知らないし

translation.en: Maybe you should tell her.
Can you get me on a plane or not?
translation.ja: ところで乗せてくれる？

translation.en: I'm sorry, miss, but I can't help you today.
translation.ja: 残念ながら できかねます

translation.en: [exhales] You look just like me when I was your age.
[in Spanish] I'm able to know that.
[George in English] Where are we going this time?
[Sam] Top of the Mackenzie River.
translation.ja: マッケンジー川の河口

translation.en: [George] Jesus. That's past Inuvik.
translation.ja: イヌヴィックより先か

translation.en: Where are they gonna send us next, the North Pole?
-Excuse me. -[PA system beeps]
-Sorry. Excuse me? -[voice over PA] Flight 899…
translation.ja: ちょっと　失礼 待って

translation.en: Excuse me! Sorry. Hi.
Did you say you're going to Inuvik?
Uh… past Inuvik, yeah.
This is gonna sound crazy,
translation.ja: 変に思うでしょうけど

translation.en: but, is there any way you guys could take me with you?
translation.ja: 変に思うでしょうけど 私を一緒に連れていって

translation.en: Crazy for who? You don't even know us.
translation.ja: 俺たち 初対面だよな

translation.en: Look, I'm small, I have this one bag. I promise I'll be quiet.
translation.ja: 荷物も少ないし静かにするから

translation.en: Quiet's not really an option on a Cessna 208.
translation.ja: 静かになんて無用だよ

translation.en: I just, I really need to get to Inuvik today. And it looks like my plane is stuck somewhere and--
translation.ja: 今日 行きたいのに搭乗できずに…

translation.en: -I'm sorry, we'd love to help you out. -[Liv] Then help me out.
translation.ja: 申し訳ない 助けてよ

translation.en: -Please. -If it was just me?
translation.ja: お願い 俺だけならな

translation.en: You know, but we're doing this for work.
translation.ja: 俺たちは仕事で行くんだ

translation.en: Somebody else is picking up the tab and then if something happens, I think they may be liable for--
translation.ja: 他人を乗せて何か起こっても責任は…

translation.en: No, they wouldn't. That's not…
I'm a lawyer. That's not a thing.
I'm sorry. Good luck.
I'll give you a thousand dollars.
Each. I'll give you each a thousand dollars.
Look, you guys do Venmo? I can-- I can send it to you right now.
translation.ja: 今 送金アプリで送る

translation.en: Look, I feel for you. We just can't do it.
translation.ja: すまんが できない

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane.
I just want to sit on your plane and travel in the direction that you're already flying.
translation.ja: あなたたちと同じ方向に行きたい

translation.en: -That's it. I just-- -Okay! Okay.
translation.ja: そうか　分かったよ

translation.en: -[security] Everything all right here? -Yes.
translation.ja: 解決しました？ ああ

translation.en: Thank you. We're, we're just figuring out who gets the window seat.
translation.ja: 大丈夫誰が窓際に座るか決めてた

translation.en: Seriously?
Yeah.
-Sure. We'll get you to Inuvik. -[George sighs]
Oh, my God, thank you. I'm Liv, by the way.
translation.ja: ありがとう　私はリヴ

translation.en: -Sam. -[Liv] Sam. This is George, pilot ordinaire.
translation.ja: サムだこっちは操縦士のジョージ

translation.en: [in loud voice] Just souping her up. Sam likes to go fast.
translation.ja: エンジン全開で飛ばすよ

translation.en: Cool.
All good?
All good.
You're a nervous flier?
[in unamplified voice] I'm a nervous crasher.
-I said no, I'm a nervous crasher. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 違う　墜落が怖いの

translation.en: -[rattling] -Is this normal?
Late summer air, mixtures of hot and cold, makes for a rough ride.
translation.ja: 晩夏は暖気と寒気が混じり揺れが大きくなる

translation.en: [George] Hey. Hey, no cell phone. You'll mess with the instruments.
translation.ja: 携帯は禁止だ計器をダメにする気か

translation.en: -Seriously? That's a real thing. -[Sam] Uh, it's fine.
translation.ja: それ 本当？ウソだと思ってた ジョージはアナログ技術しか信用しない

translation.en: George just doesn't trust anything without a rotary dial.
translation.ja: ジョージはアナログ技術しか信用しない

translation.en: Isn't there like smoother air higher up or something?
translation.ja: 上空へ行けば穏やかでは？

translation.en: Do you have other thoughts? How's my tracking?
-I'm sorry. I'm just-- -[Sam] Don't worry.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい 大丈夫　彼に任せろ

translation.en: George knows what he's doing.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　彼に任せろ

translation.en: [George] If I didn't, I wouldn't tell you.
Hey, you want a drink?
Might help calm your nerves.
-No, I'm good. -[Sam] You sure?
You want a Power Bar, bottle of water?
translation.ja: プロテインバー 食うか？

translation.en: Cocktail, New York Times?
-I'm not really a Power Bar person. -You ever been to Inuvik?
translation.ja: バーは嫌い イヌヴィックは初めて？

translation.en: There's not gonna be much open by the time we land. Take them.
translation.ja: 今 食べなきゃ食いっぱぐれるぞ

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh, what… takes you to the northwest territories?
translation.ja: なぜノースウエスト準州へ行こうと？

translation.en: I'm shooting the caribou run.
Uh, not shoot. "Shoot."
translation.ja: 獲(と)るんじゃなくて“撮る”

translation.en: I'm a photographer for National Geographic.
translation.ja: 俺は自然誌の写真家だ

translation.en: Wow, your job's so much cooler than mine.
translation.ja: 私より断然 クールな仕事ね

translation.en: Well, I don't know about that. What kind of law do you practice?
translation.ja: さあねどんな訴訟を担当してる？

translation.en: I'm a securities litigator.
You're right. My job is cooler.
translation.ja: 俺のほうがクールだな

translation.en: Caribou run this late? I thought that was a spring thing.
translation.ja: カリブーが移動するのは春だと思った

translation.en: Hey, you got to go somewhere to come back, right?
translation.ja: 移動した先にいるだろ

translation.en: I just go where they tell me.
I'll be sitting in a camouflage tent with a thermos full of coffee and about 8,000 cameras,
translation.ja: コーヒー入りの水筒を抱えテントでカメラを構えて

translation.en: waiting for anything with antlers to run by.
That sounds nice.
It does, doesn't it?
And what about you?
What brings a securities litigator this far north?
Um, just… boring lawyer stuff.
translation.ja: 退屈な業務の関係でね

translation.en: Uh, it seemed like more of an emergency back at the airport.
I'm gonna take a nap.
Uh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying--
translation.ja: 詮索(せんさく)する気は…

translation.en: No, it's fine. it's just I'm-- I'm tired. Took me forever to get in from…
translation.ja: 大丈夫　疲れただけ出発まで長かったし

translation.en: -I'm just… tired. -[Sam] All right.
translation.ja: 本当に疲れただけ そうか

translation.en: We'll try to keep it down for you.
[woman speaks in a calm voice] Close your eyes.
Ensure you're resting in a comfortable position.
translation.ja: 楽な姿勢で休めるようにしなさい

translation.en: Inhale and exhale slowly,
translation.ja: ゆっくりと呼吸をするのです

translation.en: in through the nose and out through the mouth.
translation.ja: 鼻から息を吸って口から吐いて

translation.en: Focus on tensing and relaxing each part of your body.
translation.ja: 体の各部位で緊張と弛緩(しかん)を繰り返して

translation.en: Allow all thoughts to fall away.
translation.ja: 頭の中を空っぽにしなさい

translation.en: You are only your body.
You are only your breath.
[Ruth] Hey, you made it.
-Hi. -[Liv] Hi. Of course, I made it. You said you were having a crisis?
translation.ja: ピンチだって言ってたよね

translation.en: Yeah, the crisis was that you never come out to these things.
translation.ja: ここへ来させる口実よ

translation.en: -Ruth, I have work to do. -[Ruth] No, Liv, no.
translation.ja: 仕事があるの リヴ 待って

translation.en: -No. Come on. -[Ruth] We have all have work to do,
translation.ja: リヴ 待って まずは これを持って

translation.en: but right now take this…
translation.ja: まずは これを持って

translation.en: -[Liv] No. -…your work is beating Danny at darts.
translation.ja: イヤよ ダーツでダニーを負かすのよ

translation.en: -[stammers] -[Ruth] We're down a player. Yes, yes.
translation.ja: ダーツでダニーを負かすのよ

translation.en: -Go. No, it's fine just go. It's great. -[Liv] Are you fucking…
translation.ja: 大丈夫　さあ 行って

translation.en: -[Ruth chuckles] -Hey.
I think I just got tricked.
Why? You thought it was a shuffleboard tournament?
translation.ja: シャッフルボード大会だと？

translation.en: I can't stay long.
Okay.
Am I ready for this? I hear you're a shark.
I've never played before.
That's exactly what a shark would say.
Is Ruth trying to set us up?
Yeah, I think she is.
Is that appropriate?
-No, it isn't. -[Danny] Right.
That's what I… Okay.
Although, I guess, technically, we're not at work.
translation.ja: 厳密に言えば仕事中じゃないけど

translation.en: Right. Bit of a gray area.
translation.ja: そうだ　グレーゾーンだね

translation.en: -Why are we flying so low? -[alarm blares]
-[alarm beeps] -No, shit I got nothing!
-Whoa, buddy! We're going down! -There's no pressure and fuel!
translation.ja: 墜落するぞ 燃料がない

translation.en: George!
Put on your seatbelt.
Oh, my God.
[Sam] Help. Help! George. George, help me out.
translation.ja: ジョージ 助けて助けてくれ

translation.en: -[Sam] Right here. -[Liv] Yeah.
[Liv] Are you okay?
[gasping, pants] I can't swim. [heavy breathing] I can't swim.
-Do you have, uh, life preservers? -[whimpers]
-Sam! Sam, do you have life preservers? -[George groaning]
translation.ja: サム 救命具はあるの？

translation.en: Flotation devices, something?
-No. I don't know. I'll check. -[George grunting]
translation.ja: 分からない　確認するよ

translation.en: My leg is stuck!
Guys, we got to get out of here! I mean, this thing's gonna sink!
translation.ja: 脱出だ　機体が沈むぞ

translation.en: Sam, I'm gonna need your help. Sam?
translation.ja: サム 助けが必要なの

translation.en: What are you doing? Sam? No!
translation.ja: サム 何してるの？ ちょっと！

translation.en: -No, just stop, that hurts! -I know it hurts,
-but we've gotta get you out of here. -Okay.
Hold your breath.
Please. Don't leave me.
translation.ja: 俺を見捨てないでくれ

translation.en: [Sam] Liv!
Help!
Kick your legs!
-Just kick your legs! -[Sam] Help!
-Help me! -Use your legs, Sam.
translation.ja: 助けて 脚を使うの

translation.en: -It's okay, Sam. -Please, help me.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 お願いだ　助けてくれ

translation.en: -Help me! -Hey!
translation.ja: お願いだ　助けてくれ ちょっと

translation.en: [Sam] Help me!
Sam, look at me! Stop!
I need you to stop or we'll both drown, okay?
translation.ja: 暴れれば２人とも溺れる

translation.en: -[pants] -Stop, look I got you.
Kick your legs, -I'll take us both in, okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.ja: バタ足して　連れてくから

translation.en: -Okay. -[panting]
-You got me? -I got you.
[Liv in a weak voice] Oh, Sam.
We made it.
We're good.
Sam?
Sam?
Hey.
Hey.
Hey. Hey, Sam, wake up.
translation.ja: ちょっと サム　起きてよ

translation.en: Hey, Sam.
Sam!
Hey, Sam!
Oh, shit.
-Sorry, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -No!
You just have this metal thing in your leg,
translation.ja: 脚に金属が刺さってる

translation.en: -I'm trying to take it out. -No! No, no, no, no, no, I'll bleed out.
translation.ja: やめてくれ　失血死する

translation.en: It's pretty bad.
A tourniquet.
You have to make a tourniquet.
Okay.
-[Sam] My belt, use my belt. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 俺のベルトを使え ええ

translation.en: Okay. It's okay. I got it. I got it.
translation.ja: 分かった　やってみる

translation.en: Wrap it round.
-[groans, grunts] -I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
[Liv] I can't get it tight enough.
Sam?
Sam, how do I make it tighter?
Okay, I think I got it.
Oh, thank God it stopped.
Shit, how do I keep this tight?
Fuck!
Stay with me, Sam. Please.
translation.ja: 死なないで サム お願い

translation.en: Okay.
It stopped.
Sam… Sam, it stopped.
translation.ja: サム 血が止まったわよ

translation.en: Shit.
I'm sorry, Sam.
Sam… [pants] I'm not leaving.
translation.ja: サム 離れるつもりはないの

translation.en: I'm just gonna go try and get higher to see if I can get service, okay?
translation.ja: 通話できるか確かめに行ってくる

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[whispers] It's okay, it's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　きっと大丈夫

translation.en: One bar. Just one bar. Stupid trees.
translation.ja: 電波１本だけでいいから立って

translation.en: [in normal voice] Really? Fuck.
translation.ja: ウソ　まったくもう

translation.en: [screams] Fuck!
Hello?
Help!
Is anybody out there?
Come on.
Are you kidding me?
Come… [sighs]
[in a strained voice] Come on, are you fucking kidding me?
translation.ja: ちょっと ふざけてるの？

translation.en: Okay. Well, I didn't see you helping.
translation.ja: これでよし手伝ってくれなかったね

translation.en: We'll figure out something better tomorrow.
Night, Sam.
Sam?
-[Sam groans] -Sam. Sam.
-Hey, it's Liv. -[grunts]
-Oh, it hurts. -I know, don't try to move. It's your leg.
translation.ja: 痛みが… 動いちゃダメ　脚でしょ

translation.en: No, my stomach. [groans] It fucking hurts.
translation.ja: 違う 腹だ腹がメチャメチャ痛い

translation.en: -Make it stop. -Okay. Wait, hold on. Let me see.
translation.ja: 止めてくれ 分かった　見せて

translation.en: Oh, God. Shit.
Where's the plane?
It's… it's gone.
We crashed.
-What? Where? -[Liv] I don't know.
translation.ja: 何だって？　どこで？ さあ

translation.en: Where's George?
We're-- we're just gonna have to wait for them to find us.
translation.ja: 私たち助けを待つしかないのよ

translation.en: We're gonna sit tight and we're gonna, we're gonna stay right here--
translation.ja: ここでじっと待ってるしか…

translation.en: No, they're not coming.
Of course, they are.
George logged a flight plan. When you don't show up, your company's gonna send--
translation.ja: あなたの会社の人が気付いて…

translation.en: No, they're not.
Sam.
Where are the bags?
-Where-- where are the bags? -Sam, National Geographic's not just…
translation.ja: バッグはどこだ？ あなたの同僚が⸺

translation.en: When you don't show up, they're gonna send someone.
I'm not a photographer.
No one's coming. No one knows we're here.
translation.ja: 誰も俺たちの居場所を知らない

translation.en: You're on your own.
